title: RITO CONSIDER THE FOLLOWING, ARCADE CORKI!
body:
I know you have made the MF arcade and she is the adc BUT think about what your doing here.
arcade corki would be amazing ( don't have an attachment so use your imagination)
corki is flying a space invader his q would be so cool, his napalm would make sense seeming as tho space invader shoot down, be creative with his w (which i think is the machine gun one) and his ult would be like the blocks that Space invaders shoot and his jacked one could be all colorful.
i cry every time i think of this and hope you create it, which i dont think you will seeming as tho we have MF skin so you know.... maybe this can be like a teaser that you will never see and will regret your decisions i dont know but your choice. goodbye.
like my Bill Nye reference

replies.body: hehe sort of but more arcady you know
